links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
mathematica: ContinuedFraction[Sqrt[32],300] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Mar 06 2011 *)PadRight[{5},100,{10,1,1,1}] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Aug 20 2014 *)
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 16000); x=contfrac(sqrt(32)); for (n=0, 20000, write("b010130.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 04 2009
